nodes.text: Drazaal Row was a street in the Duros Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, Imperial Intelligence maintained an outpost along the street that monitored the sector.
Drazaal Row appears as part of the Duros Sector in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
